title: Local Orlando shooting victim writes Facebook message
content:
NEW ORLEANS – A man from Metairie who was shot in the head during the Pulse Nightclub attack has written his first message on Facebook since the shootings.
Leonel Melendez, who was shot in the head and leg during the attack last month, thanked people for the love and support Sunday via a Facebook post on his page.
The post read:
Hello world! After my unfortunate tragedy I am trying to get back to FB little by little. However, I just want to thank EVERYONE FROM THE BOTTOM OF MY HEART FOR THE LOVE AND SUPPORT! It's going to be a good few months of recovery but with God's help and my wonderful family/friends I will make it. Special thank you to my entire family and my closed friends for being with me thru this. LOVE YOU ALL AND CAN't wait to personally give everyone a special thanks and hug for being with me through this hard time in my life. LOVE YOU ALL AND HOPE TO SEE EVERYONE SOON.
